title: Inmate Escapes From Jail Without Anyone Noticing
teaser: A lawyer visited a jail in Marysville, Wash., intending to see his client. Guards could not find the inmate. That was their first clue that Rhyan Vasquez had escaped. He'd been gone two days.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
